WorkItem.ClosedComment: This would be addressed by addition of ES6 'template strings' which is tracked by suggestion http://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/19.
WorkItem.Description:
Since TypeScript is aligned toward the new ECMAScript proposals, it'd be nice if it supported the proposed heredoc-style strings. Which are multiline strings using the ` character. Example:

var message:string = `this
  would
     all
      be in the
        same string`;

// => "this\n  would\n     all\n      be in the\n        same string"

#suggestion

Comments.Message: Assigning to Jonathan who is managing our suggestions
